Ingatlanod.com

My first website that I made from scratch for a client. I've set up a few goals that I wanted to meet once I was finished with the product, these were:

  • - Fast Loading — No libraries, all custom code.
  • - Plain Javascript — To load as fast as possible, I wanted to keep it simple.
  • - Structured Code — Easy to understand for later modifications, if needed.
